mapper.insert: insert into bus_statement_item (statement_id, item_id, item_name, item_price, item_quantity) values (#{statementId}, #{itemId}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemQuantity})
mapper.update: update bus_statement_item set statement_id = #{statementId}, item_id = #{itemId}, item_name = #{itemName}, item_price = #{itemPrice}, item_quantity = #{itemQuantity} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, statement_id, item_id, item_name, item_price, item_quantity from bus_statement_item
